title: TOSHIBA AC25CEW-BS Large 6-Slice Convection Toaster Oven Countertop, 10-In-One with Toast, Pizza and Rotisserie, 1500W, Black Stainless Steel, Includes 6 Accessories
description: This Toshiba 25L toaster oven features a digital menu display that lets you monitor time and temperature with digital accuracy and also allows you to navigate and choose the many functions and mode of the countertop toaster oven. It boasts both beauty and function with its elegant Black Stainless Steel panels and features like convection and Rotisserie cooking. It's ability to perfectly cook a wide variety of both savory and sweet dishes makes this stainless steel toaster oven an essential equipment to your home kitchen. Upper and lower heating elements and a convection fan provide even cooking.
